form, it simply means a social visit. But in contemporary usage, it usually involves

and lively, consisting in Ireland mainly of jigs, reels, hornpipes, .... Duple-time.

the context of competitions at public events such as the Highland games, where it 
is often performed to the accompaniment of Highland bagpipe music ... Highland 
dance is its own sport, with millions of dancers competing across...
